usage: firsttry [-h]
                {run,inspect,sync,status,setup,doctor,mirror-ci,version} ...

FirstTry — local CI engine (run gates / profiles / reports).

positional arguments:
  {run,inspect,sync,status,setup,doctor,mirror-ci,version}
    run                 Run checks (fast by default)
    inspect             Show detected context/profile/plan
    sync                Sync local firsttry.toml with CI files (export CI →
                        config)
    status              Show hooks + l...

usage: firsttry run [-h] [--profile {fast,strict}] [--tier {developer,teams}]
                    [--source {auto,config,ci,detect}]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --profile {fast,strict}
                        Which profile to run (fast, strict)
  --tier {developer,teams}
                        Output summary tier (developer|teams). Overrides
                        FIRSTTRY_TIER env var.
  --source {auto,config,ci,detect}
                        Where to ...
